WorkItem.ClosedComment: Here are your options:1) Compact Paper Doll Mode: In the Options dialog, this hides the Shirt and Tabard buttons on the paper doll and moves the gloves to the left side. This effectively cuts a necessary row off the paper doll which allows it to compress.2) Browser Zoom: Ctrl+MouseWheel. Silverlight is designed to resize based on your Browser's zoom settings. Putting it at 90% along with CPDM (above) should resolve the issue.3) Buy a monitor made in the last 5 years. You can find decent 20" widescreens for under a hundred bucks these days.
WorkItem.Description: This is kind of a bug (for me anyway) and kind of a feature request I guess. But anyway: I suppose this is a result of LCD's, but for people still using CRT's it be nice if the program was a bit more compact or made more configurable so stuff like the find field would show up. At the moment it's unusable since it's smashed together into nothingness with the other buttons, though I'm pretty sure older revisions didn't do this at 1152X864.
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Find Field does not show at 1152X864
